text: [Nekotoryye] uverovavshiye sprashivayut: "Pochemu ne nisposlana sura [o dzhikhade]?" Kogda zhe nisposlana neprelozhnaya sura s predpisaniyem srazhat'sya [s nevernymi], to uvidish', chto te, ch'i serdtsa ushcherbny, vzirayut na tebya s vidom poteryavshikh soznaniye pered smert'yu. Dlya nikh predpochtitel'neye
